roleset.name: come about, become, come about from a prior condition
roleset.note: RESULTANT-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in Thyme, framed by Claire. Comparison to result-v.01. (from resultant.01-j)

example.name: Ergative
example.text: The compromise plan will result in the elimination of American jobs.
example.arg: in the elimination of American jobs

example.name: goal subject
example.text: The hazards to workers resulted from corporate indifference to worker safety. Arg2 rel Arg1-from
example.arg: from corporate indifference to worker safety

example.name: Both args
example.text: Similarly , the breast cancer could potentially be resultant from radiation exposure , but that still leaves the colon cancer .
